column2: Acceptance Criteria: The RAP is free from foreign material such as unbound granular base, broken concrete, or other contaminants.

Acceptance Criteria: 100% passing on 13.2 mm sieve
Record of conformity: NATA accredited test certificate

2.01 - Binder blend viscosity (for asphalt mixes containing >15% RAP content only)
• The blended binder viscosity is within the range of:
– 320-500 Pas for a target binder class of C320,
– 450-680 Pas for a target binder class of C450, or
– 600-880 Pas for a target binder class of C600
Reference Documents: AfPA RAP Management Plan Section 8.5.2
Inspection/ Test Method: AGPT/T191, AGPT/T192, AGPT/T193
Record of conformity: NATA accredited test certificate
